articles.title: SS&C Blue Prism: On the journey from RPA to agentic automation
articles.description: For organizations who are still wedded to the rules and structures of robotic process automation (RPA), then considering agentic AI as the next step for automation may be faintly terrifying. SS&C Blue Prism, however, is here to help, taking customers on the journey from RPA to agentic automat...
